title: Tomato basil vermicelli with goat's cheese
ingredients: ['1 (500g) packet vermicelli pasta', '1 (400g) tin whole plum tomatoes', '2 fresh tomatoes, chopped', 'handful fresh basil leaves', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 lemon, juiced', "100g (4 oz) soft goat's cheese"]
